decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy by using various spells and creatures to mill the opponent's library while protecting your own. With cards like Ruin Crab and Into the Story, the deck aims to fill up the opponent's graveyard and force them to draw cards, potentially decking them out. Additionally, the inclusion of counter spells like Mystical Dispute and efficient removal spells like Heartless Act and Eliminate help maintain control of the game and prevent the opponent from gaining an advantage.

The main strategy of this Gruul Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with efficient, aggressive creatures like Brushfire Elemental and Lovestruck Beast, while utilizing powerful combat tricks like Embercleave and Shatterskull Smashing to push through damage and control the battlefield. The deck also includes ramp cards like Tangled Florahedron and Jaspera Sentinel to ensure consistent land drops and access to larger threats like Goldspan Dragon. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, hard-hitting creatures and finish the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck focuses on quickly cycling through cards to trigger various effects like Zenith Flare, Improbable Alliance, and Irencrag Pyromancer. By utilizing cards like Flourishing Fox and Valiant Rescuer, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes counter spells like Disdainful Stroke to protect against threats. With a mix of cycling synergies and aggressive creatures, this deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while controlling the board and finishing off with burst damage from Zenith Flare.

This Sultai Control deck focuses on maximizing value from its cards through card advantage, removal, and ramp. The deck includes a variety of threats and answers, along with powerful interaction spells to disrupt opponents' plans. The deck also features Emergent Ultimatum to pull off game-winning combos. The companion Yorion, Sky Nomad helps generate even more value by blinking permanents. By leveraging its versatile card pool and strong mana base, this deck aims to outlast opponents and control the game until it can establish a dominant board presence.

The key strategy of this Naya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive creature-based offense. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Lovestruck Beast and Giant Killer, as well as powerful cards like Elite Spellbinder and Bonecrusher Giant, the deck aims to maintain board presence and apply pressure early in the game. The inclusion of cards like Showdown of the Skalds and Kabira Takedown allows for additional burst damage and removal options. With the support of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion, the deck aims to consistently apply pressure and outpace the opponent.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By using cards like Immersturm Predator, Bonecrusher Giant, and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The deck also includes cards like Claim the Firstborn and The Akroan War to disrupt the opponent's strategy and gain an advantage. With a mix of creature threats and spell disruption, this deck is designed to apply constant pressure and force the opponent to react defensively.

This Sultai Control deck focuses on using a wide range of removal spells and counterspells to control the game while ramping up mana with cards like Cultivate and Quandrix Cultivator. The deck also includes powerful threats like Polukranos, Elder Gargaroth, and Emergent Ultimatum to establish board presence and close out the game. The addition of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value by blinking cards like Omen of the Sea and Binding the Old Gods. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through careful resource management and strong late-game plays.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Brazen Borrower, Goldspan Dragon, and Bonecrusher Giant to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure to the opponent. The inclusion of Obosh as a companion emphasizes doubling the damage output of odd-costed cards in the deck. The deck also includes a mix of powerful spells like Alrund's Epiphany and counterspells like Mystical Dispute to control the game. The Great Henge provides additional value while cards like Kazandu Mammoth and Lovestruck Beast offer versatility in combat. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and efficient tempo strategy.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly cycle through your cards to create a large board presence and deal damage to your opponent using the Cycling mechanic. By cycling through your deck and generating tokens with cards like Valiant Rescuer and Improbable Alliance, you can set up for a massive Zenith Flare to finish off your opponent. This deck aims to be fast and aggressive, overwhelming your opponent with multiple threats and burning them down with efficient card cycling.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a mixture of powerful creatures and aggressive spells. By ramping up mana with cards like Lotus Cobra and Showdown of the Skalds, the deck aims to play multiple threats each turn and maintain a steady stream of pressure. Cards like Bonecrusher Giant and Lovestruck Beast provide a mix of removal and resilient threats, while the deck's strong mana base allows for consistent and explosive plays. The goal is to curve out efficiently and close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures, while also utilizing sacrifice effects for additional value. By constantly pressuring the opponent and sacrificing creatures for benefits, this deck aims to create a strong board presence and maintain control of the game. With a mix of removal, token generation, and card draw, this deck aims to outpace the opponent and secure victory through utilizing the synergy between sacrifice effects and aggressive creatures. Its versatility allows for different strategies depending on the matchup, making it a strong contender in Standard 1 vs 1 format.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and burn spells. By utilizing creatures with haste and powerful abilities, along with efficient removal and damage spells, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain that pressure throughout the game. The inclusion of snow lands allows for the use of snow synergies like Frost Bite and Faceless Haven, adding versatility and additional reach to the deck's game plan.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. It aims to disrupt the opponent's plans while setting up its own win conditions. The inclusion of Kaheera as a companion provides additional value and synergy with the deck's creatures. The mana base is designed to ensure consistency in casting spells of all colors. Ultimately, the goal is to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent, using powerful control tools like Teferi, Master of Time and Professor Onyx to dominate the game.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of removal spells and counterspells, using cards like Mystical Dispute, Eliminate, and Heartless Act. It also aims to ramp up mana quickly using cards like Cultivate and Quandrix Cultivator to cast powerful spells like Emergent Ultimatum and Alrund's Epiphany. With Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion, the deck can blink key permanents for value. The deck also runs a variety of threats like Elder Gargaroth and Polukranos, Unchained to pressure opponents while maintaining control of the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing control spells and card advantage to outvalue the opponent. By including Yorion as a companion, the deck gains access to additional cards each game. The deck runs a variety of removal spells, counterspells, and board wipes to control the game. It also includes powerful threats like Elder Gargaroth, Vorinclex, and Valki to pressure the opponent. Emergent Ultimatum and Cultivate help ramp up to big plays, while cards like Omen of the Sea and Mazemind Tome provide card selection and draw. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color mana requirements.

This deck focuses on creating a quick and aggressive board presence by using small, efficient creatures in combination with powerful white cards that can disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion allows for recurring valuable creatures from the graveyard. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flood of creatures while utilizing removal spells and protective abilities to maintain board control and push for victory.
